edl.name: Committee.Form
edl.title: - Nomination of Research Committe

validation.expression: (((wf:field('department2') != 'Select' and not(wf:field('major2') = 'Select'))) or (wf:field('department2') = 'Select' and not(wf:field('major2') = 'Select')) or (wf:field('department2') = 'Select' and (wf:field('major2') = 'Select')) or (wf:field('department2') = 'Select' and wf:empty(wf:field('major2'))))

((wf:field('outsideMember') = 'Yes' and not(wf:empty(wf:field('outsideMember1Name')))) or ((wf:field('outsideMember') = 'No') and wf:empty(wf:field('outsideMember1Name')) and wf:empty(wf:field('outsideMember2Name')) and wf:empty(wf:field('outsideMember3Name'))))
validation.message: If you have an outside member select 'Yes' and enter their name, otherwise select 'No' and leave the name fields blank
Confirm email address and email address do not match
University ID must be 10 digits beginning with zeros
please enter your e-mail address in the correct name@domain.com format
please enter your e-mail address in the correct name@domain.com format

xsl:variable.name: isAtCommitteeDeptbNodes
xsl:variable.select: $isAtCommitteeMem1 = 'true' or $isAtCommitteeMem2 = 'true' or $isAtCommitteeMem3 = 'true' or $isAtCommitteeMem4 = 'true' or $isAtCommitteeMem5 = 'true' or $isAtCommitteeMem6 = 'true' or $isAtDepartment1b = 'true' or $isAtDepartment2b = 'true'

td.font: Your Nomination of Research Committee Form has been submitted for review and approval. Refer to the student reference guide on the University Graduate School page in OneStart to learn to track your document. You may now close this window.

Approver for First Major listed - Please complete the following items:
-Date Candidacy Approved... in the "Program Information" section
-Endorsed? in the "Committee Members" section
-If there are outside committee members , make sure to mark them as "Approved" in the "Committee Members Outside of University..." section.

font.b: Nomination of Research Committee for the Ph.D.

td.br: Enter a dot if no middle name
Enter a dot if no middle name

font.b: Committee Members Outside of University, or Those Not Able to be Listed Above

td.font: Attach a CV for each outside committee member.**
(By clicking approve, you are proxy approving for them.)

tr.td: Please attach a one-to-two page summary of the proposed research. *
If the research involves human subjects, animals, biohazards, biosafety, or radiation, please also attach an approval from the appropriate committee.

td.font:
Documents should be attached to a note in the "Create Note" section at the bottom of this form.
Click the "browse" button to search for your document, after you've selected it, click the "save" button that is to the right of the note. A new "note" box will pull in after saving. There can only be one attachment per note, but you can create multiple notes.
This must be approved by the University Graduate School at least six months before you defend.

font.b: For University Graduate School Use Only

b.font: This form is being refreshed. Please wait.
